div.class: missing_option_warning alert alert-info rounded-0 fade show d-print-none

div.div:
Your Snippet data will be displayed here.This message is displayed because you have not configured the snippet yet.
Check the document and video for the configuration.

div.class: missing_option_warning alert alert-info rounded-0 fade show d-print-none

section.div: In case of misconfiguration, no product is found and no price list is configured, Slider will not be displayed.

h6.t-attf-class: my-1 mb-0 product_name #{'te_2_line' if (website.number_of_product_line == '2') else 'te_3_line' if (website.number_of_product_line == '3') else ''}

span.t-attf-class: text-danger oe_default_price te_p_disc {{'' if combination_info['has_discounted_price'] else 'd-none'}}

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-secondary btn-sm px-3 py-2 a-submit not_product_page te_theme_button #{'disabled out_of_stock' if product.sudo().virtual_available < 1 and product.inventory_availability in ['always', 'threshold'] else ''}
a.title: Shopping cart
a.t-att-id: 'add_to_cart' if ajax_cart and not product.optional_product_ids else ''

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-secondary btn-sm px-3 py-2 a-submit not_product_page te_theme_button #{'disabled out_of_stock' if product.sudo().virtual_available < 1 and product.inventory_availability in ['always', 'threshold'] else ''}
a.title: Shopping cart

button.title: Quick View
button.class: btn btn-secondary te_theme_button btn-sm px-3 py-2 quick-view-a te_quick_view
btn btn-secondary te_theme_button btn-sm px-3 py-2 o_add_wishlist
button.title: Add to Wishlist
